item.title: Seelie Court
item.description: Part of Faerie (particularly the Fair Folk) is ruled by the Seelie Court. The Court is made of many titled fey, collectively called the Courtly Ones.

item.title: index
item.description: Fey society, or Faerie, is primarily based in the Feywild, but some of it has spilled into the Material Plane.

item.title: Chugwater
item.description: Was originally planned to be a railroad depot, but it is not much more than a roadhouse today. Site includes: Chugwater Roadhouse.

item.title: Machine
item.description: A depot and road house not far from the end of the existing rail bed from Ogallah.

item.title: Ogallah
item.description: A rowdy cattle down between Oma and Deadbridge on the railroad. Where the North Platt and South Platt meet. Last main stop of the current rail line.

item.title: Apothecandy
item.description: $1 samples available. One sample per party, must be consumed on premises.

item.title: Boyd's Razor
item.description: Boyd Sugg’s pearl-handled razor blade. +1 dagger, but can’t be thrown If it hasn’t drawn blood in the past 24 hours, it grows frosty cold.

item.title: Elemental Planes
item.description: The elemental planes of Air, Earth, Fire, and Water are the source of substance and raw magic.

item.title: Ethereal
item.description: As per 5e’s Border Ethereal, this coterminous plane is just slightly out of phase with the Material Plane.

item.title: Feywild
item.description: The Feywild (also sometimes called Faerie) is a vibrant verdant plane with vaguely positive-energy alignment.
